con:part.con:content: <definitions targetNamespace="http://globalbooks.com/catalog" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://globalbooks.com/catalog" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://globalbooks.com/catalog" elementFormDefault="qualified"> <xsd:complexType name="Book"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="title" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="author" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="price" type="xsd:decimal"/> <xsd:element name="category" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="getBookByIdRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getBookByIdResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="book" type="tns:Book" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getBooksByCategoryRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="category" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getBooksByCategoryResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="books" type="tns:Book" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="getBookByIdRequest"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:getBookByIdRequest"/> </message> <message name="getBookByIdResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:getBookByIdResponse"/> </message> <message name="getBooksByCategoryRequest"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:getBooksByCategoryRequest"/> </message> <message name="getBooksByCategoryResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:getBooksByCategoryResponse"/> </message> <portType name="CatalogPortType"> <operation name="getBookById"> <input message="tns:getBookByIdRequest"/> <output message="tns:getBookByIdResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="getBooksByCategory"> <input message="tns:getBooksByCategoryRequest"/> <output message="tns:getBooksByCategoryResponse"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="CatalogBinding" type="tns:CatalogPortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="getBookById"> <soap:operation soapAction="getBookById"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="getBooksByCategory"> <soap:operation soapAction="getBooksByCategory"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="CatalogService"> <port name="CatalogPort" binding="tns:CatalogBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/catalog-soap/catalog"/> </port> </service> </definitions>
